strengths.detail: The organization directs <cite id="2">100.0% of its total expenses</cite> toward its educational and humanitarian programs, significantly exceeding the <cite id="1">peer program ratio median of 81.7%</cite>.
The charity spends <cite id="1">$0.00 to raise every $1</cite> in contributions, ensuring that donor funds are not eroded by marketing or solicitation costs.
The organization reported <cite id="2">total assets of $4,878,550</cite> in 2023, providing a substantial foundation for future programmatic expansion.

strengths_deep_dive: AR-Rahman Learning Center Inc's financial profile is characterized by extreme efficiency and rapid scaling. The organization reported a <cite id="2">3-year revenue CAGR of 4242.3%</cite>, moving from a small operation to one managing over <cite id="2">$4.5 million in annual contributions</cite>. This growth has been managed without increasing overhead, as the <cite id="1">program expense ratio remains at 100.0%</cite>. Furthermore, the organization possesses <cite id="1">785.8 months of working capital</cite>, which is nearly 20 years of operating reserves at current spending levels, indicating a unique level of financial security for a religious and cultural non-profit.
rich_narrative.summary: AR-Rahman Learning Center Inc is an educational and humanitarian organization that focuses on providing <cite id="1">affordable services in education, healthcare, and social welfare</cite>. Based on its most recent financial filings, the organization reported <cite id="2">total revenue of $4,559,370</cite> for the 2023 fiscal year. The charity operates with a primary focus on religious and cultural education, offering programs such as <cite id="1">Quran classes, Arabic language instruction, and Islamic studies</cite> through both private and group settings. Financially, the organization demonstrates a high commitment to its core mission, allocating <cite id="2">84.1% of its expenses toward program services</cite> according to its latest tax filings. This lean operational model is further evidenced by a <cite id="1">fundraising efficiency of $0.00 per $1 raised</cite>, indicating that the organization does not currently incur significant costs to generate its contributions. While the organization has seen a massive <cite id="2">revenue growth rate of 4242.3%</cite> over the last three years, it maintains an exceptionally high liquidity position with <cite id="1">785.8 months of working capital</cite> held in working capital, suggesting a very conservative financial management style or a recent large influx of capital yet to be deployed.
